properties.caption: Caption text goes here below the image.

fields.label: You can add an image to help set the theme for your Survey
A Range field allows you to set a slider with maximum and minimum values and defined increments:
Insert an Image field if you wnat users to add pictures to their survey:
Insert an Audio field if you want users to add sound recordings to their survey:
A Checkbox field allows you to add a range of answers.
A Single answer field allows your users to choose only one answer using radio buttons.
A Select field lets you create a dropdown list of responses:
Here is another Single answer field but this time the option you choose will create different follow up questions:
A Range for Set 1: Add an even number.
A range for set 2: Add and odd number
A text field allows users to write there own answer, you can limit the characters, 10 in this case:
Finally there is the Text Area, for longer answers:
